.. _api_reference:

=============
API REFERENCE
=============

The API reference provides detailed descriptions of YAFS's classes and
functions. It should be helpful if you plan to extend YAFS with custom
components.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   yafs
   yafs.core
   yafs.topology
   yafs.application
   yafs.population
   yafs.placement
   yafs.selection
   yafs.utils
